name: RAGSystem
goal: To orchestrate the interaction between all agents and ensure smooth execution of tasks in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation system.

sub_agents.name: Main Agent
sub_agents.description: Acts as the primary agent that manages and coordinates the overall workflow of the RAG system.
sub_agents.goal: To orchestrate the interaction between all other agents and ensure smooth execution of tasks.

sub_agents.name: Query Augmentor
sub_agents.description: Enhances user queries using different query analysis techniques for efficient processing.
sub_agents.goal: Improve query understanding and efficiency by applying augmentation methods.

sub_agents.name: Task Orchestrator
sub_agents.description: Breaks down user queries into smaller, manageable tasks for efficient handling.
sub_agents.goal: Ensure optimal task distribution and execution for best response generation.

sub_agents.name: Retrieval Planner
sub_agents.description: Generates a perfect plan for each task related to information retrieval.
sub_agents.goal: Create effective plans to guide the information retrieval process.

sub_agents.name: Information Retriever
sub_agents.description: Uses various tools to gather information based on the planned retrieval strategy.
sub_agents.goal: Collect relevant data efficiently according to the generated plan.

sub_agents.name: LLM Generator
sub_agents.description: Generates responses using a large language model based on retrieved information.
sub_agents.goal: Produce accurate and contextually appropriate answers to user queries.

sub_agents.name: Response Evaluator
sub_agents.description: Evaluates the quality of LLM-generated responses based on specific tasks.
sub_agents.goal: Ensure that the generated responses meet the required standards and accuracy.

sub_agents.name: Response Refiner
sub_agents.description: Refines and polishes the final response before delivering it to the user.
sub_agents.goal: Enhance the clarity, coherence, and relevance of the output.

sub_agents.name: Response Gatherer
sub_agents.description: Gathers all partial responses from the database to form a complete answer.
sub_agents.goal: Compile step-wise responses stored in the database into a unified output.

tools.name: Query Analyzer
tools.description: Applies various techniques to analyze and understand user queries more effectively.

tools.name: Task Decomposer
tools.description: Breaks complex user queries into simpler, actionable tasks.

tools.name: Retrieval Strategy Planner
tools.description: Develops detailed plans for retrieving information based on individual tasks.

tools.name: Multi-tool Information Retriever
tools.description: Utilizes different tools to collect information as per the planned retrieval strategy.

tools.name: LLM Response Generator
tools.description: Generates natural language responses using a large language model.

tools.name: Response Evaluator
tools.description: Assesses the relevance and correctness of generated responses against the original task.

tools.name: Response Aggregator
tools.description: Collects and integrates partial responses stored in the database.

workflows.name: MainWorkflow
workflows.description: End-to-end workflow for processing user queries through a RAG system with multiple specialized agents and tools.

steps.description: Receive and analyze the user query for RAG processing
Enhance the user query using different query analysis techniques
Break down the enhanced query into manageable tasks
Store pending tasks in temporary database
Generate a perfect retrieval plan for each task
Gather information using different tools based on the retrieval plan
Store step-wise responses in database based on plan and task
Gather all partial responses from database
Generate response using LLM based on retrieved information
Evaluate LLM-generated response based on the original task
Refine and polish the final response
Deliver the final response to the user
